Gushing Essential Oil.Effect: Increases all party members' Anemo DMG by 25% for 300s.
Gushing Essential Oil.In-game Description: Grants greater affinity for Anemo, boosting Anemo DMG.It has a fragrant smell. It is said that using it during your travels will make you walk as if you're riding on the wind.

Streaming Essential Oil.Effect: Increases all party members' Hydro DMG by 25% for 300s.
Streaming Essential Oil.In-game Description: Grants greater affinity for Hydro, boosting Hydro DMG.It's a slippery medicine for external use, able to better channel Hydro energy. It has a subtle fragrance.

Dendrocide Potion.Effect: Increases all party members' Dendro RES by 25% for 300s.
Dendrocide Potion.In-game Description: A potion that boosts Dendro RES and suppresses the growth of plants.Rather than killing the plants, it puts them in deep hibernation. It's also said to be good for the body if ingested.

Flaming Essential Oil.Effect: Increases all party members' Pyro DMG by 25% for 300s.
Flaming Essential Oil.In-game Description: Grants greater affinity for Pyro, boosting Pyro DMG.It is made of materials that gestate Pyro, which serves to draw in Pyro energy more effectively. It also makes the user more fired-up and passionate.

Windbarrier Potion.Effect: Increases all party members' Anemo RES by 25% for 300s.
Windbarrier Potion.In-game Description: A mysterious potion that boosts Anemo RES and makes one able to withstand strong winds.It works wonders for adventurers out in the world and is even said to keep the cold away.

Desiccant Potion.Effect: Increases all party members' Hydro RES by 25% for 300s.
Desiccant Potion.In-game Description: A kind of potion that boosts Hydro RES and makes one able to withstand highly humid environments.It is said to act like a desiccant and be highly effective at keeping items dry. It can also be ingested for the same effect.

Insulation Potion.Effect: Increases all party members' Electro RES by 25% for 300s.
Insulation Potion.In-game Description: A potion that boosts Electro RES and keeps one from getting electro-shocked.Induces a tingling sensation when drank. It is said to work by filling the body with inversely charged electrical energy, which counteracts the effect of Electro damage.

Heatshield Potion.Effect: Increases all party members' Pyro RES by 25% for 300s.
Heatshield Potion.In-game Description: A miraculous potion that boosts Pyro RES and makes one able to withstand high heat.The principle of it is making the body adaptable to the heat instead of cooling the body.

Shocking Essential Oil.Effect: Increases all party members' Electro DMG by 25% for 300s.
Shocking Essential Oil.In-game Description: Grants greater affinity for Electro, boosting Electro DMG.It induces a tingling sensation on the skin and renders the user better able to better channel Electro energy â€” but comes with a risk of causing an electrical fire that would definitely ruin your perfect hair.

Unmoving Essential Oil.Effect: Increases all party members' Geo DMG by 25% for 300s.
Unmoving Essential Oil.In-game Description: Grants greater affinity for Geo, boosting Geo DMG.You can feel the fine Geo pellets within when applied. It's said to help with physical injuries.

Frostshield Potion.Effect: Increases all party members' Cryo RES by 25% for 300s.
Frostshield Potion.In-game Description: A miraculous potion that boosts Cryo RES and makes one able to withstand extreme cold.Induces a chilling sensation when drank, but once you get used to the chilling cold, you won't feel cold anymore.

Forest Essential Oil.Effect: Increases all party members' Dendro DMG by 25% for 300s. Grants greater affinity for Dendro, boosting Dendro DMG.
Forest Essential Oil.In-game Description: Grants greater affinity for Dendro, boosting Dendro DMG.It's a nourishing external medicine that promotes growth of plants, able to better channel Dendro energy.

Dustproof Potion.Effect: Increases all party members' Geo RES by 25% for 300s.
Dustproof Potion.In-game Description: A potion that boosts Geo RES and keeps one from getting bothered by sand and dust.It has a strange taste not unlike that of magnets. It keeps a traveler clean from all the sand and dust out there.

Frosting Essential Oil.Effect: Increases all party members' Cryo DMG by 25% for 300s.
Frosting Essential Oil.In-game Description: Grants greater affinity for Cryo, boosting Cryo DMG.It has a chilling sensation when applied, and helps one to better channel Cryo energy. It also helps to keep you cool-headed and calm.
